pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Preparation and Diagnostics for Random Effects Within Estimator // Diagnostics and data preparation for random effects within estimator, random effects within-idiosyncratic estimator, between-within-idiosyncratic model, and cross- classified between model. Mundlak, Yair (1978) doi:10.2307/1913646. Hausman, Jeffrey (1978) doi:10.2307/1913827. Allison, Paul (2009) doi:10.4135/9781412993869. Neuhaus, J.M., and J. D. Kalbfleisch (1998) doi:10.2307/3109770.
